metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3107 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 5.16-rc6. netvsc_get_ethtool_stats in drivers/net/hyperv/netvsc_drv.c lacks check of the return value of kvmalloc_array() and will cause the null pointer dereference.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3107` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.19.0-46-generic - 5.19.0-15.15
linux-image-5.19.0-46-generic-lpae - 5.19.0-15.15
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-46-generic - 5.19.0-15.15
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-46-generic-64k - 5.19.0-15.15
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1028-aws - 5.19.0-1005.5
No subscription required

No subscription required
